description: crescent-shaped pendant; three-dimensional; concave on front; decorated with loops and rows of twisted wire at edges on front; convex ball at center of pendant; one applied ball at lower left corner/point; ball at top below hanging loop; chain without clasp or closure, attached to pendant by looping (chains for .42 and .44 received separated from pendants)
dimension:
1 7/8 x 2 1/4 x 7/16 in. (4.76 x 5.72 x 1.11 cm) (pendant only)
23 1/2 in. (59.69 cm) (object part, chain length, approx.)
title: Pendant with chain
